00033 #include "rum_types.h"
00034 #include "mac.h"
00035 #include "radio.h"
00036 
00044 void macStartCoord(void)
00045 {
00046     if (NODETYPE == COORD)
00047     {
00048         // Local vars.
00049         u16 panid;
00050 
00051         // Generate a random PANID and stick into the radio.
00052         if(PAN_ID != BROADCASTPANID)
00053             panid = PAN_ID;
00054         else
00055         {
00056             panid = radioRandom(8);
00057             panid <<= 8;
00058             panid |= radioRandom(8);
00059         }
00060         
00061         radioSetPanId(panid);
00062         macConfig.panId = panid;
00063 
00064         // Generate a random short address and stick into the radio.
00065         radioSetShortAddress(DEFAULT_COORD_ADDR);
00066         macConfig.shortAddress = DEFAULT_COORD_ADDR;
00067     }
00068 }
